meanings.definition: Safrols: a type of chemical compound found in certain essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the safrols under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The safrols added a pleasant scent to the perfume.
meanings.sent3: The safrols in the oil were having a party, creating a fragrant atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of safrols was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The safrols sparkled like tiny gems in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Safrols: plural form of safrol, a compound used in the production of fragrances and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: The store stocked up on safrols for making new perfumes.
meanings.sent2: She added safrols to the recipe to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The safrols decided to throw a fragrance party in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The safrols danced in the air, spreading their aromatic magic.
meanings.sent5: The safrols transformed the room into a fragrant paradise.
